text: Aimŋgɨzand, wɨram kɨra Jerusalemɨnd ya Mosesɨnd injambɨr ahe sɨkahɨnd hamb aiampɨra ohɨra Jerusalemɨŋ erere ŋketai eretai ñɨhɨri kamŋgɨmar. Itɨ kɨvahɨnd anɨŋnsar han, mbɨkɨr ensa Belsebul, Jisasɨh ŋgɨŋe awarohe ñɨñmbɨri arɨmŋgɨmar. Ave itɨ kɨvahɨnd anɨŋnsar mbanamb Jisasɨh aŋkarɨpɨr eŋgwazand, mbɨ itɨ kɨvah han kiaŋgworaŋgwɨj arɨmŋgɨmar.
